content: repeat from @ to @ once 2dc ch3 2dc in next ch2 space repeat from * twice skip round 9 ch3 double_crochet in base of chain double_crochet in each of next next 4dc 8dc in next ch2 space join with slip_stitch in 3rd chain of 6dc * @ 2dc ch3 2dc in next ch3 space double_crochet in each beg ch3 of next 6dc increase in next double_crochet ch3 skip next ch3 space single_crochet in round 4 slip_stitch in next st sl stm ch3 double_crochet ch3 2dc in next ch3 space ch3 4 times skip next ch3 space @ increase in next ch3 space ch1 * skip next 2dc double_crochet in next double_crochet ch1 8 next double_crochet double_crochet in each of next 6dc repeat from * twice times skip next 2 double_crochet 2dc ch3 2dc in next ch3 space ch1 then repeat from @ to @ once repeat from * twice skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet ch1 8 times join with slip_stitch in 3rd chain of first ch3 rnds 10-12 work 3 rnds in same manner as round 9 assembly join 4 row of 3 squares each from having 3 more double_crochet each side of ch3 corner space and one right side of work sew or single_crochet squares together from less ch3 space in center of each side the center of a corner to center of next corner match- round 13 ch3 double_crochet in base of chain double_crochet in each of next 18 ing stitches and working through back loops only double_crochet * @ 2dc ch3 2dc in next ch3 space double_crochet in each of next 18 double_crochet increase in next double_crochet double_crochet in next ch3 space edging from right side of work join b yarn with twice @ increase in next double_crochet double_crochet in each of next 18 double_crochet repeat slip_stitch in any single_crochet along outer edge of afghan from * twice then repeat from @ to @ once round 1 ch1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around working 3sc in round 14 ch3 double_crochet in each double_crochet around working 2dc each ch2 corner space and single_crochet in end of joining between ch3 2dc in each ch3 corner each square join with slip_stitch in beg single_crochet space - 50 double_crochet each side round 2 ch4 * skip next single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet ch1 repeat round 15 ch4 skip next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet ch1 11 from * around entire piece working double_crochet ch3 double_crochet in times skip next double_crochet * double_crochet ch3 double_crochet in next ch3 space each corner single_crochet join with slip_stitch in 3rd chain of ch4 ch1 double_crochet in next double_crochet ch1 skip next double_crochet 25 times repeat round 3 single_crochet in each double_crochet and in each ch1 space around from * twice double_crochet ch3 double_crochet in next ch3 space ch1 double_crochet in working single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in each ch3 corner space join with next double_crochet ch1 skip next double_crochet 13 times join with slip_stitch in 3rd slip_stitch in beg single_crochet chain of beg
